extendedInfo.description: iPuke is simply the best drinking game ever invented. Our team has worked (I mean drunk) really hard to come up with this amazing app and hopefully you'll have a BLAST playing it!Wondering how it works? Ok, here we go!- Matches can have from 2 to 11 players (the more the better!)- The game is played in turns: each player at a time. You start your turn by drawing a card, and each card is made of 2 challenges: to perform a funky dare and, of course, to take a few drinks!- You must either perform the dare or take the drinks before you can pass the phone (and the turn) to the next player. However, if you get greedy, you can do both and double the points!- Cards come in 4 difficulties: easy, medium, hard and extreme. The higher the difficulty, the more points you get and the more you have to drink.- The first player to reach the points goal wins. Plain, simple and very competitive. Intrigued? Then check out some dares you'll face when playing this game:* Text "I love you" to a random contact on your phone* Place some ice cubes in your underpants* Sing a song from the Bee Gees* Impersonate a chicken and lay an egg* Have someone draw a mexican moustache on your face* Kiss someone's belly button... that and much more!Are you and your mates up for it?

reviews.title: funniest game ever!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t laughed this much in ages, played this with friends in a pub & it was hilarious, everyone was watching & taking pics & videos of wot we were doing, make sure you have a make-up pencil with you! so many people downloaded the game right there, absolutely give this game 10 out of 10 xxxxxxxxx
reviews.author: Sarah Knight

reviews.title: The game is great!!!
reviews.comment: Fantastic game, fantastic graphics, and fantastic dares! The concept of this game is just great although if you play it more than once you\'ll find that challenges get repeated too frequently (sometimes in the one game). Please, please, please add more challenges. Makes a great night!!
reviews.author: Cameron Foley

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: its pretty good i reckon havent found anything wrong with it yet
reviews.author: Jayde Clarke

reviews.title: Totalmente excelente
reviews.comment: Muito bem feito e super criativo.
reviews.author: Carlos Eduardo R\303\274hrwiem

reviews.title: Next turn difficulty
reviews.comment: LG lucid, can\'t figure out how to get to the next players turn,  I\'m clicking that the playing did that challenge and doesn\'t continue on to the next player. HELP!!!
reviews.author: Dustin Romanos

reviews.title: Fant\303\241stico
reviews.comment: Seria perfeito se fosse poss\303\255vel editar ou adicionar novos desafios.
reviews.author: Victor Scattone

reviews.title: Brilliant! But..
reviews.comment: Its an amazing funny app that\'ll keep you entertained for the night! I think you should add a feature that lets you write in your own dares. If not make more? We love this game but dont want to keep doing the same things over and over!
reviews.author: Lauren Davis

reviews.title: Upsetting
reviews.comment: I did both dare and drank the shots but when I went to press next, it wouldn\'t let me.
reviews.author: Heather Winkler
